Thanks for the replies. Our test harness is already implemented using JUnit=
. So, converting it to TestNG can be a hassle. If I want to keep JUnit but =
implement the Priorities, what could be the best way? It looks like I would=
 need to override the runner method where we can check the priority and dec=
ide whether to execute or not. Any alternate way?

BikuDAA
